title: Five Reasons The 16th Floor of EPIC Miami Lives Up To The Hotel's Name
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
I might have checked into one of many modish, oceanfront hotels on South Beach, but instead I opted for the concrete jungle that is Downtown...
